name: Emberwing: Lost Legacy HD - A Hidden Object Adventure with Dragons
name_original: Emberwing: Lost Legacy HD - A Hidden Object Adventure with Dragons
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

A dragon has awoken after a hundred years of slumber to attack your house in the dead of night and take your son Tevin, believing he has a special power that will help their kind. Meanwhile, elves and other magical beings are after him as well. Can you rescue your son from the dragon's clutches before it's too late?

• LEARN THE SECRET OF THE EMBERWING
Legend predicts that a special child will come to the forest, an Emberwing, with the ability to speak to dragons!

• ENTER THE DARK FOREST
Scour the forest for 50 hidden collectible dragon medals and earn achievements while solving unique puzzles and finding clues and inventory items!

• MEET AN ELVEN ALLY
Long ago, dragons and elves were allies until the greedy dragons stole the elves’ treasures.

• EXPLORE THE WORLD OF DRAGONS IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
Enjoy exclusive extras such as beautifully drawn wallpapers, cut scenes, and concept art!
